thread.title: Listen: Frantic 911 Call After Odom Collapse
thread.title_full: Listen: Frantic 911 Call After Odom Collapse

author: news.sky
title: Listen: Frantic 911 Call After Odom Collapse
text:
Former basketball star Lamar Odom, the estranged husband of reality TV star Khloe Kardashian, had used cocaine and herbal Viagra before he was found unresponsive in a brothel, according to 911 calls released by police. He was taken to hospital on Tuesday after being found by staff at the Love Ranch legal brothel in Crystal, Nevada.
Odom had been using cocaine on Saturday and had taken as many as 10 performance-enhancing tablets in the three days before he collapsed, employees at the brothel told emergency services.
Kardashian and her sisters Kim and Kourtney, her mother Kris Jenner and half-sister Kendall Jenner are all reportedly at his bedside at Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas.
Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian in 2011. She filed for divorce in 2013
On Wednesday, Kendall tweeted: "Please don't go."
Nye County Sheriff Sharon Wehrly told a press conference: "During that call the reporting parties informed the Nye County Sheriff's Office Dispatch the male had been using cocaine.
1 / 16 Gallery: In Pictures: Lamar Odom
Former NBA star Lamar Odom arrives to attend a custody hearing at New York State Supreme Court on March 5, 2013 in New York City
"They confirmed his usage on Saturday, but were unsure if it had continued.
"They also informed dispatch he had used up to 10 tabs of sexual performance enhancer supplements over the three-day period.
"He was unconscious, but breathing.
"He had blood coming from his nose and mouth along with a white substance."
Blood samples from Odom are yet to be tested by the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Laboratory, she added.
Members of the sheriff's department were unable to give any information about Odom's condition, but Detective Michael Eisenloffel said contact has been made with one member of the Kardashian family and they were "understandably distraught in the circumstances".
The recordings of three 911 calls were also played at the press conference.
Play video "Nevada Brothel Owner On Lamar Odom" Video: Nevada Brothel Owner On Lamar Odom In one, the caller can be heard telling the dispatcher that Odom is whimpering but appears to be in a deep sleep with white fluids coming out of his nose and mouth.
Rev Jesse Jackson, Los Angeles Lakers star Kobe Bryant and former Chicago Bulls player Mike Brown are among those who have gone to see Odom in hospital.
Odom married Khloe Kardashian, the younger sister of Kim Kardashian, after a whirlwind engagement, in 2009.
But she filed for divorce in 2013 citing irreconcilable differences.
Odom, who last played in the NBA in 2013, was suspended during the 2000-01 season for violating the NBA's anti-drug policy for the second time in eight months.
His former coach, Bill Bayno, described Odom as a "great, great human being" in an interview with E! News.
Lamar Odom was raised by his grandmother after his mother died of cancer when he was 12. His father was a drug addict.
